COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Chad Curtis
$Scott Lewis hit HP umpire Tim Tschida with a pitch accidentally after time out called
Hayes hit a fly ball to LF but play nullified by the balk
changed from E3 to double
off LF pole screen
Mark Langston left with strained left hip
Junior Felix pulled homer back
Edgar Martinez left with bruised left calf

ej,parrl001,P,roe-r901,Fighting ej,valld001,P,roe-r901,Fighting $catcher Dave Valle caught the ball but runner Chad Curtis avoided a collision by spinning off Valle's left leg; HP Umpire Rocky Roe ruled safe but Valle went after the sprawled Curtis and slapped his mitt onto the runner's chest; both benches emptied for a 5-minute melee; Valle and Lance Parrish ejected by Roe
originally ruled an error; changed by official scorer
$Roberto Alomar ttried to tag runner Rene Gonzalez but 2B umpire Dale Ford ruled no tag
ej,polol001,P,clara901,Call at 1B Luis Polonia ejected by 1B umpire Al Clark
Chris Hoiles left with injury when hit on helmet by Von Hayes foul ball; suffered laceration requiring three stitches
Gary Gaetti left with a sore right elbow
ej,wathj001,M,cobld901,Called third strike Angels manager John Wathan ejected by HP Umpire Drew Coble
Jeff Russell's 100th career save
Matt Nokes left game with stomach flu
Debut game for Tim Fortugno
$Jack Morris interfered with Junior Felix as he ran out a grounder
$Edgar Martinez out on appeal for leaving 3B too soon
Von Hayes lost the ball in the lights
ej,wathj001,M,voltv901,Call at 2B Angels manager John Wathan ejected by 2B umpire Vic Voltaggio sometime in game
Rene Gonzales left with bruised left forearm
$Kenny Lofton pulls back a home run
Sandy Alomar Jr left with tightness in his left knee
Tim Salmon left with a sore left wrist
$infield fly; ball dropped by Luis Sojo
